name: Ged Maheux (@gedeonm@mastodon.social)
summary:
Attached: 3 images

This is my new favorite thing! Artist Ememem takes cracks in sidewalks, walls and other urban environments and fills them with colorful, mosaic tiles. The results are just joyous. Boy, I really love this. I could see myself doing stuff like this after I retire, maybe I can apprentice. ðŸ˜‚  #Art #Artwork #StreetArt
